The Neosho High School Future Business Leaders of America attended the State Leadership Conference in Springfield, MO April 14th - 16th.

Their game was the #1 game in the state of Missouri beating other high schools and technical schools from throughout the state. Their submission and #1 ranking has earned them the title of State Champions and the right to compete at the National Conference located in San Antonio, TX this July.

Congrats to these Wildcats on a job well done and best wishes in July!
